title: "Balance" Rock Crystal Poesy Ring Necklace
description: Find your perfect balance. This "Balance" Rock Crystal sterling silver poesy ring necklace will empower and inspire you. Shop today!
cleaned_text: Find your perfect balance. This "Balance" Rock Crystal poesy ring necklace will empower and inspire you. Each of our poesy rings is inscribed with a personal message (or poesy) that can be uniquely meaningful for each of us. Style the rings on different chains. Wear your necklace with one ring or multiple rings to tell your perfect story. Poesy rings date back as early as the 15th Century. They were rings that bore poetic inscriptions and were exchanged as expressions of friendship, inspiration and love. What's your perfect poesy? - Sterling Silver - Set with Rock Crystal - Engraved with "Balance" - Size 5 - For other ring sizes explore our [Poesy Stackable Collection](https://www.monicarichkosann.com/collections/poesy-stackable-rings). Responsibly Created. We are a Certified B Corporation® committed to the highest standards for quality and excellence as we build a more sustainable jewelry collection. [ Earn Points with MRK Rewards.
